---
title: Comparing Differences in GATK and DRAGEN Pipelines
subtitle: VCF Analysis
---

# GATK versus DRAGEN

```{r}
library(VariantAnnotation)

# Compare two files
gatk_vcf <- readVcf("data/uic_first_batch/vcf/Broad-AF-UIC-Cases-UIC0002.vcf")
dragen_vcf <- readVcf("data/uic_second_batch/vcf/SM-OJRMH.hard-filtered.vcf")

# Check number of variants
nrow(gatk_vcf)
nrow(dragen_vcf)

# Check filter status
table(fixed(gatk_vcf)$FILTER)
table(fixed(dragen_vcf)$FILTER)

# Review headers
meta(header(gatk_vcf))
meta(header(dragen_vcf))
```
